verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> more than any <S%H3605><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> or than a branch <S%H2156><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest? <S%H3293><s%>

Shall wood <S%H6086><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> thereof to do <S%H6213><s%> any work? <S%H4399><s%> or will men take <S%H3947><s%> a pin <S%H3489><s%> of it to hang <S%H8518><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> thereon? <S%H5921><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is cast <S%H5414><s%> into the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel; <S%H402><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> devours <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> the ends <S%H7098><s%> of it, and the middle <S%H8432><s%> of it is burned. <S%H2787><s%> Is it meet <S%H6743><s%> for any work? <S%H4399><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> when it was whole, <S%H8549><s%> it was meet <S%H6213><s%> for no <S%H3808><s%> work: <S%H4399><s%> how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> less shall it be meet <S%H6213><s%> yet for any work, <S%H4399><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> it, and it is burned? <S%H2787><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> As the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel, <S%H402><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them; they shall go <S%H3318><s%> out from one fire, <S%H784><s%> and another fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass, <S%H4604><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
